name: futilely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has no effect or achieves nothing: I was walking home after a long day of futilely searching for a job. The police tried futilely for two years to get the criminals prosecuted.
More examplesFewer examplesParamedics worked frantically, and futilely, to save him.Hundreds of patients were futilely attempting to get help.He would awake in a panic, and struggle futilely to get back to sleep.I knelt among the broken pieces, futilely trying to sweep them back together with my arms.
